tool_description: LINE Messaging API lets you develop two-way communication between your service and LINE users. Push and reply messages Push messages are messages that your bot can send to users at any time. Reply messages are messages that your bot sends in response to users' messages. 1-on-1 and group chats Send messages not only to users who have added your bot as a friend but also in group chats that your bot has been added to.
name: LINE Messaging
title: LINE Messaging

api_list.name: Get content
api_list.description: Gets image, video, and audio data sent by users.

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get rich menu ID of user
api_list.description: Gets the ID of the rich menu linked to a user.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID. Found in the source object of webhook event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Download rich menu image
api_list.description: Downloads an image associated with a rich menu.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of the rich menu with the image to be downloaded

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get rich menu list
api_list.description: Gets a list of all uploaded rich menus.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get rich menu
api_list.description: Gets a rich menu via a rich menu ID.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get profile

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID that is returned in a webhook event object. Do not use the LINE ID found on LINE.

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get default rich menu ID
api_list.description: Gets the ID of the default rich menu set with the Messaging API.

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Get number of sent reply messages
api_list.description: Gets the number of messages sent with the /bot/message/reply endpoint.

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Date the messages were sent. Format: yyyyMMdd (Example: 20191231) Timezone: UTC+9

test_endpoint.message: Authorization header required. Must follow the scheme, 'Authorization: Bearer <ACCESS TOKEN>'

api_list.name: Issue channel access token
api_list.description: Issues a short-lived channel access token.

api_list.name: Send reply message
api_list.description: Sends a reply message in response to an event from a user, group, or room.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/message/reply"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Revoke channel access token
Create rich menu
api_list.description: Creates a rich menu.  You must upload a rich menu image, and set the rich menu as the default rich menu or link the rich menu to a user for the rich menu to be displayed. You can create up to 1000 rich menus for one bot.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Link rich menu to user
api_list.description: Links a rich menu to a user. Only one rich menu can be linked to a user at one time.  The rich menu is displayed in the following order of priority (highest to lowest): The per-user rich menu set with the Messaging API, the default rich menu set with the Messaging API, and the default rich menu set with LINE@ Manager.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: User ID. Found in the source object of webhook event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.

api_list.name: Upload rich menu image
api_list.description: Uploads and attaches an image to a rich menu.  You can use rich menu images with the following specifications:  Image format: JPEG or PNG Image size: 2500x1686 or 2500x843 pixels Maximum file size: 1 MB Note: You cannot replace an image attached to a rich menu. To update your rich menu image, create a new rich menu object and upload another image.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: Upload and attache an image to a rich menu.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: The ID of the rich menu to attach the image to

api_list.name: Unlink rich menus from multiple users
api_list.description: Unlinks rich menus from multiple users.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu/bulk/unlink"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Set default rich menu
api_list.description: Sets the default rich menu. The default rich menu is displayed to all users who have added your LINE official account as a friend and are not linked to any per-user rich menu.

required_parameters.name: richMenuId
required_parameters.description: ID of an uploaded rich menu

api_list.name: Link rich menu to multiple users
api_list.description: Links a rich menu to multiple users.
api_list.code:

url = "https://line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com/bot/richmenu/bulk/link"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "line-messaging1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Issue link token
api_list.description: Issues a link token used for the account link feature.

required_parameters.name: userId
required_parameters.description: User ID for the LINE account to be linked. Found in the source object of account link event objects. Do not use the LINE ID used in LINE.
